title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Introduction to Euclidean Geometry Using Online Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Algebra and Geometric Concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Participants will be able to simulate circle properties and Euclidean proof processes using geometric tools (e.g., GeoGebra).
Participants will enhance spatial reasoning skills through real-time geometric analysis with peers using online collaboration features.
Participants will be able to propose applications of Euclidean principles to everyday problems (e.g., office layout, data chart design).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
